HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Při objednání v pracovních dnech do 10:00 doručení následující pracovní den

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Balíkovna: 59 Kč, GLS - výdejní místa: 59 Kč, PPL výdejní místa: 59 Kč, Zásilkovna: 64 Kč

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: GLS - výdejní boxy: 59 Kč, PPL Alzaboxy: 59 Kč, PPL Parcelboxy: 59 Kč, Zásilkovna ZBox: 64 Kč

IN_STORE_PICKUP.pricing: Výdejní místo Praha: 39 Kč, Výdejní místo Chrudim: 15 Kč

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Hodinky.cz provides several delivery methods within the Czech Republic, including home delivery, an extensive network of parcel shops and lockers, and in-store pickup.
PRICING: Home delivery is priced at 89 Kč. Delivery to parcel shops (Balíkovna, GLS, PPL, Zásilkovna) and lockers (GLS, PPL, Zásilkovna) ranges from 59 Kč to 64 Kč. In-store pickup is available in Prague for 39 Kč and Chrudim for 15 Kč. Free shipping is offered for all orders over 2,500 Kč. A packing fee of 25 Kč is applied to orders under 350 Kč.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Same-day in-store pickup is a key service, available for orders placed by specific morning deadlines. Most other delivery methods promise next-business-day delivery if the order is placed before the cutoff time.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented clearly on a dedicated page, with each option detailed in its own section showing price, delivery time, and order deadlines. However, the specific carrier for the standard 'Home Delivery' option is not identified, and information regarding COD surcharges or weekend delivery is missing.
